entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json source generator should support JsonConverter on non-nullable and nullable types #66547
  • C# dllmain with nativeaot #66546
  • terrafx.interop.windows and Assembly.FullName problem when compile using NativeAOT #66545
  • System.IO.FileSystem tests fail all over with temp on Fat32 #66544
  • Intermediate Certs not being sent from client to server on MAC #66537
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json 5.0.0 cannot refer to System.Text.Json 5.0.1 #66532
  • [API Proposal]: Separating the common UDT types using Microsoft.SqlServer.Server NuGet package #66531

Closed

  • Assert: global_regions_to_decommit[kind].get_num_free_regions() == (size_t)num_regions_to_decommit[kind] #66540
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821.cmd #64972
    7.0.0
  • `AccessViolationException` breaks System.IO.FileSystem tests #66515

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix setting the default value of WasmExceptionHandling. #66548
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Remove BB limit from importer_vectorization #66534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use `npm` from emsdk when running `sanitize.py` #66533
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Fix assert failure in distribute_free_regions #66495
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reenable HostApplicationBuilderTests disabled on Mono/Windows #66521
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Arm64: Always use SIMD features #66411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable RevokeEndEntity_PolicyErrors_NotTimeValid #66520
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix compiler warning 4244 in host #66518
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [mono][wasm]Enable WASM exceptions as an experiment #66524
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement X500DistinguishedNameBuilder #66509
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable Fast Tail Call Optimization for ARM32 #66282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Less MonoClassField arithmetic and less direct offset access #66519
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector WidenLower and WidenUpper on Arm64 #66512
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Use `wasm-tools` workload to run benchmarks for wasm #66493
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #66522
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Backport AVX context fix #66120 #66356
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generate method should generate inside existing partial `Program` for top-level code #60136
  • AnalyzeDataFlow fails for stackalloc array creation initializer expression #60134
  • Should we block references to `Program` in top level code projects #60133
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #60132

Closed

  • [Possibly Missing Specification?] XML-Documentation of "delegate*<>" method parameters produces Warnings #60135

PullRequests

Created

  • Run two attempts of new integration tests using harness functionality #60139
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixed codefix "Use discard pattern" incorrectly applied to foreach in top-level statements #60138
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merges/main to release/dev17.3 #60137
    Area-IDE
  • Backport lock contention fixes to 17.1 #60130
    Area-IDE
  • Provide name suggestions based on both collection and its element type #60129
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not show top-level-symbols inside type declarations #60131
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix path to readme.md #60019
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60128
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #60142
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60141
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60140
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Roslyn.Diagnostics.Analyzers to 3.3.4-beta1.22160.2 #60118
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Support smart pasting of contents into strings. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Report a "better" error for an unmatched checked user-defined operator. #60111
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Adjust delegate caching logic for abstract statics. #60092
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #60093
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60124
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Remove obsolete helpers #60010
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE
  • Respond with updated diagnostics when EnC diagnostics state is different #60081
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0 #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use frozen partial semantics for syntax classification #60122
    Area-IDE
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed compound assignment #60116
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net 7 is on ubuntu 21.10 and libmsquic on 20.04 http3 #40679
  • [Blazor] Fetch logic should check if the asset is present in the list of included assets before deciding to serve index.html #40678
  • Design Proposal: Dynamic/Async paths for StatusCodePages and ExceptionHandler middleware #40677
  • Introduce Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #40676

Closed

  • Xamarin.Mac: WebHost.RunAsync without CancellationToken fails with Unsupported platform exception #40553
  • React SignalR - customHeader #40659
  • .NET 6 and AKS - how to keep web app from snoozing? #40592
  • Thon chanvannak #40673
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #40674

PullRequests

Merged

  • Quarantining ReadAsync_WithAllowInputFormatterExceptionMessages_RegistersJsonInputExceptionsAsInputFormatterException #40662
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Add support for route handler filter factories #40667
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers. #40671
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Issues

Created

Closed
